Name: CoLab
About the game: Do you have what it takes to solve more than 100 challenging puzzles in the first virtual reality show while being 'advised' by our witty narrator to entertain the audience? Step right up, step right up to the world's first VR reality show CoLab. Our 'friendly' show host will guide you through the labyrinth full of unique puzzles, offering advice which will always end up in a lot of fun, at least for him. Puzzles are hand made for VR and carefully tested, so you don't need to worry about getting sick as our former testing subjects...ehm, I meant contestants. So what are you waiting for? Don't miss this unique chance and join us for our grand opening of CoLab the VR reality show. Features more than 100 puzzles more than 4 hours of gameplay unique bossfights intuitive controls immersive AF comfortable design over 500 unique narrator voiceover lines Please rate us and let us know what you think in the comments. Our game designers read all the feedback :)
